titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for further expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the second session of the One Hundredth Congress.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on House Administration. Report No: 100-958.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 412 - 2 (Record Vote No: 357).

bill.summary: 9/8/1988--Introduced. Provides amounts for the further expenses of investigations and studies by the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for the remainder of the second session of the 100th Congress. Authorizes the use of such funds for the procurement of consultant services.
